thread.title: 'Moonlight' Takes Best Feature at the 2017 Film Independent Spirit Award Winners

author: V Ren√©e
title: 'Moonlight' Takes Best Feature at the 2017 Film Independent Spirit Award Winners
text:
'Moonlight' Takes Best Feature at the 2017 Film Independent Spirit Award Winners Get your live coverage of the 2017 Film Independent Spirit Awards here. 
Today's the day! The 2017 Film Independent Spirit Awards are about to kick off with hilarious hosts Nick Kroll and John Mulaney. Plenty of indie film fans are settling in to watch the ceremony , but for those unable to tune in, we're here to bring you up-to-the-minute coverage of the festivities. Below is the full list of all the nominees, and we'll be updating the page with winners as they're announced. So, keep your finger on the refresh button and get ready for some indie film goodness. Best Feature
